title: A Guide to Raising Goats with Rachael Tuller from Lost Peacock Creamery
itunes:title: A Guide to Raising Goats with Rachael Tuller from Lost Peacock Creamery
description: If you're thinking about buying goats or raising goats on your property, this is the post for you. We're covering everything you need to know about raising goats for a successful journey. We'll be covering what to know when buying goats for the first time, what to look for when buying goats, finding a goat vet, common diseases and health issues with goats, best breeds of goats for milking, and creating a dairy from goats. For more information, links and shownotes visit melissaknorris.com/319.
